<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueSymbolTable::removeValueName(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0974858ce658c475882ec1f6082145de">ValueName</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; &quot; Removing Value: &quot; &lt;&lt; V-&gt;getKeyData() &lt;&lt; &quot;\\n&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the value from the symbol table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  vmap.remove(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// createValueName - This method attempts to create a value name and insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it into the symbol table with the specified name.  If it conflicts, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// auto-renames the name and returns that instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0974858ce658c475882ec1f6082145de">ValueName</a> &#42;ValueSymbolTable::createValueName(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxNameSize &gt; -1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.size() &gt; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)MaxNameSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.substr(0, std::max(1u, (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)MaxNameSize));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the common case, the name is not already in the symbol table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IterBool = vmap.insert(std::make&#95;pair(Name, V));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IterBool.second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; &quot; Inserted value: &quot; &lt;&lt; Entry.getKeyData() &lt;&lt; &quot;: &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           &lt;&lt; &#42;V &lt;&lt; &quot;\\n&quot;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#42;IterBool.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, there is a naming conflict.  Rename this value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SmallString&lt;256&gt; UniqueName(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> makeUniqueName(V, UniqueName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dump - print out the symbol table</span></CodeLine>
